title: Fledermaus
description: Plain weave wool cloth (natural white weft, grey warp) with double weave vertical bands of 2 alternating rows of grey and white squares hold by grey outline on each side and in the center of the fabric. Plain weave wool cloth (natural white weft, grey warp) with double weave vertical bands of 2 alternating rows of grey and white squares hold by grey outline on each side and in the center of the fabric. sterling
